Text: This is a cool logic/stadegy game. It's very small program and yet very addictive. You must build a bridge with a certain budget and then have a train cross it. If the train crosses in one piece then you win.

The game works. I just downloaded and played it.

Virus free. Scanned with AVG.
It is a fine game indeed. 5/5
